Code from PGraphics.java Copyright (c) 2004-09 Ben Fry and Casey Reas Copyright (c) 2001-04 Massachusetts Institute of Technology Draw a sphere with radius r centered at coordinate 0, 0, 0.

Implementation notes:

cache all the points of the sphere in a static array top and bottom are just a bunch of triangles that land in the center point

sphere is a series of concentric circles who radii vary along the shape, based on, er.. cos or something 

 [toxi 031031] new sphere code. removed all multiplies with
 radius, as scale() will take care of that anyway

 [toxi 031223] updated sphere code (removed modulos)
 and introduced sphereAt(x,y,z,r)
 to avoid additional translate()'s on the user/sketch side

 [davbol 080801] now using separate sphRes/V
